tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    username TEXT NOT NULL,
    password TEXT NOT NULL,
    email TEXT NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE peer_review_comments (
    comment_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT REFERENCES user_accounts(user_id),
    review_id INT,
    comment_text TEXT,
    comment_date DATE
);
